abstract: Federal regulators were considering a new rescue for Citigroup on Sunday, a step that could mark a third leg of the government’s broader efforts to bolster the nation’s financial industry, according to people briefed on the plan, The New York Times’s Eric Dash and Gretchen Morgenson report.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators were considering a new rescue for Citigroup on Sunday, a step that could mark a third leg of the government’s broader efforts to bolster the nation’s financial industry, according to people briefed on the plan, The New York Times’s Eric Dash and Gretchen Morgenson report.

headline.main: Plan Begins to Emerge to Rescue Citigroup
